title: Gourmet stay in the New Forest
text: Save over 25 per cent on a gourmet dining package at Montagu Arms, one of the New Forest’s top hotels. Choose a one- or two-night stay which both include a complimentary room upgrade, seven-course tasting menu dinner at the Michelin-starred Terrace Restaurant, a bottle of Laurent Perrier champagne and an hour’s wine-tasting session with the hotel’s sommelier or a kitchen-garden tour with the head gardener, from £129 per person (based on two sharing). Book by September 25 for stays until March 31 2016 (one-night stay excludes Saturdays and Mondays; blackout dates apply). Quote: “Telegraph”; 0333 234 0392; telegraph.co.uk/montaguarmsoffer Our expert says: “Everything we ate on the Tasting Menu was elegant and unusual yet comforting and down to earth (a special mention for the local veal and the sommelier’s suggestion of an unusual fortified wine to go with the excellent cheese)”. Photo: DOM WHITE What’s included •Complimentary upgrade to a superior room •Laurent Perrier Champagne in room on arrival •Seven-course Tasting Menu dinner in the Michelin-starred Terrace Restaurant •Choice of an hour’s complimentary wine tasting with the sommelier or a tour of the kitchen garden with the head gardener •Full “New Forest” breakfast •Complimentary morning tea or coffee served to your room •Complimentary newspaper of your choice •Read the full review: Montagu Arms, Hampshire Telegraphtravel Follow @telegraphtravel
